name: Mega Starforce Remix
overview: The remixed version of Mega Starforce - Return to the Great Star. What a great game. Obviously this a one of those thrillion space invaders clones but the makers really did a good job here. The graphics are brilliant, the music is awesome but most important of all, the gameplay is fantastic! this game simply rocks, play it! Hacker's version. This game will load levels into extended RAM if you have it.
